name: Girls on the Run: Junior Coach
description: High school girls aged 16 to 18 are invited to apply to be a Junior Coach. J unior Coaches serve as powerful role models while gaining leadership skills and service credits, and benefit by being part of something meaningful while making a lasting difference in the lives of younger girls! Girls on the Run coaches are trained volunteers who lead a team of participants through a season of powerful and fun lessons. You do not need to be a runner; you simply need to have a desire to support and encou
